step_feedback.feedback: Good job clasping your hands in your lap. Keep your elbows relaxed.
You're doing well raising your hands towards your forehead. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer together as you lift.
Excellent job sliding your hands behind your head and spreading your elbows wide. This is a great stretch!
You're holding the stretch effectively. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Nicely done reversing the motion to return to the starting position. You're completing the repetitions well.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when lifting your hands and then spread them wide behind your head for a good stretch.
